item.content:encoded:
тЬЕ Enter through the grand 50 feet wide entrance gate.
тЬЕ Move seamlessly on the 40 feet wide internal roads.
тЬЕ Enjoy round-the-clock power supply to common areas.
тЬЕ Experience hassle-free 24├Ч7 water supply.
тЬЕ Feel secure with 24├Ч7 CCTV surveillance and security.
тЬЕ Relax in the peaceful environment with a separate play area for kids and sit-out area for senior citizens.
тЬЕ Stay active with the in-house Club amenities like swimming pool, basketball and badminton courts.
тЬЕ Achieve a healthy lifestyle with the open gym, meditation area, and yoga lawn.
тЬЕ Seek blessings at the in-house temple.
тЬЕ Save time with convenient shopping for your daily needs.
тЬЕ Benefit from underground cabling, sewage treatment plant and professional maintenance.
